meanings.definition: Relating to or containing lead in the +4 oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the plumbic compound to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The plumbic solution was used in the experiment for its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The plumbic paint on the walls made the room look shiny and new.
meanings.sent4: Her plumbic jewelry sparkled under the bright lights of the party.
meanings.sent5: The plumbic coating on the pipes prevented corrosion and leaks.

meanings.definition: A compound containing lead in the +4 oxidation state.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician handled the plumbic carefully to avoid contamination.
meanings.sent2: The plumbic was stored in a secure container to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The artist used plumbic in their artwork to create a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The plumbic found in old batteries can be harmful if not disposed of properly.
meanings.sent5: The plumber identified the plumbic compound causing the water discoloration.
